Service Details: - Mandate is to encourage self-sufficiency for aboriginal individuals by addressing local and regional labour market and community needs and priorities through the delivery of employment, training, programs, and services- Offers a variety of programs, such as: workplace training, employment services programs, youth/student development and disability programs- Service areas consist of six band memberships: Okanagan Indian Band; Westbank First Nation; Penticton Indian Band; Osoyoos Indian Band; Upper Similkameen Indian Band and Lower Similkameen Band; and also manages a West Kootenay Service Area
How to Apply: See application forms on the website.
